net.myorb.math.expressions.gui.rendering.implementations

Class JmtexRenderLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.gui.components.SimpleScreenIO
      • net.myorb.math.expressions.gui.rendering.implementations.JmtexRenderLib
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.myorb.data.abstractions.SimpleUtilities.PropertySetting, PrettyPrinter.MathMarkupParameterizedRendering, PrettyPrinter.MathMarkupRendering

    public class JmtexRenderLib
extends net.myorb.gui.components.SimpleScreenIO
implements PrettyPrinter.MathMarkupParameterizedRendering
    linkage layer to the CalcLib Pretty-Printer for MathML render requests. alternate version supports parameterization of display properties.
    Author:
    Michael Druckman
